patch:
@@ -22,6 +22,7 @@
                 <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
             </intent-filter>
         </activity>
+        <activity android:name=".ui.configurationActivity"></activity>
     </application>
 
 </manifest>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,18 +1,16 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
-    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
-    android:id="@+id/card_app"
+    android:id="@+id/config"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="wrap_content"
     android:layout_gravity="center"
-    android:layout_marginLeft="20dp"
     android:layout_marginTop="7dp"
-    android:layout_marginRight="20dp"
     android:background="#00af54"
     android:orientation="vertical"
     android:padding="10dp">
 
     <LinearLayout
+        android:baselineAligned="false"
         android:id="@+id/linearLayoutBig"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
         android:layout_height="match_parent"
@@ -21,11 +19,11 @@
 
         <LinearLayout
             android:id="@+id/linearLayout"
-            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_width="0dp"
+            android:layout_weight="2"
             android:layout_height="wrap_content"
             android:layout_gravity="center"
-            android:orientation="vertical"
-            android:padding="10dp">
+            android:orientation="vertical">
 
                 <TextView
                     android:id="@+id/configurationTitle"
@@ -42,15 +40,15 @@
                 android:orientation="horizontal">
 
                 <TextView
-                    android:id="@+id/date"
+                    android:id="@+id/versionTitle"
                     android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                     android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-                    android:text="Version : "
+                    android:text="Version: "
                     android:textColor="#000000"
                     android:textSize="15sp" />
 
                 <TextView
-                    android:id="@+id/date2"
+                    android:id="@+id/version"
                     android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                     android:layout_height="match_parent"
                     android:text="1.0"
@@ -65,15 +63,15 @@
                 android:orientation="horizontal">
 
                 <TextView
-                    android:id="@+id/date3"
+                    android:id="@+id/dateTitle"
                     android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                     android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-                    android:text="Date de création : "
+                    android:text="Date: "
                     android:textColor="#000000"
                     android:textSize="15sp" />
 
                 <TextView
-                    android:id="@+id/date4"
+                    android:id="@+id/date"
                     android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                     android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                     android:text="01-01-2021"
@@ -84,14 +82,16 @@
         </LinearLayout>
 
         <LinearLayout
-            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
             android:layout_height="match_parent"
-            android:gravity="center">
+            android:gravity="center_vertical|end">
+
             <Button
                 android:id="@+id/search"
                 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                 android:backgroundTint="#FFFFFF"
+                android:gravity="center_vertical"
                 android:text="modifier"
                 android:textColor="#00AF54" />
         </LinearLayout>

@@ -1,11 +1,27 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:background="#FFF"
     android:layout_height="match_parent">
 
     <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
         android:id="@+id/recyclerView"
         android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_margin="20dp"
         android:layout_height="match_parent" />
 
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/vide"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textColor="#FF0000"
+        android:width="300dp"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:text="Cette application ne contient aucune configuration enregistrée !"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
+
 </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file
